note.p: Education: Westminster School; Trinity College, Cambridge; BA (1665), MA (1668)
Career: Fellow of Trinity (1667); travelled abroad (1669); Gentleman Usher to Queen Anne; bequeathed his whole estate at Mablethorpe, Lincolnshire to the Royal Society
Editor Phil. Trans.:1682-1686 (along with Robert Plot and William Musgrave)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Venn; N&R; Gunther; Barker
References: C S S, 'The Society's Library' in NR 1938 vol 1 pp 21-27
